article_html: Ed Miliband plays pool with snooker player Ronnie O'Sullivan at the Common Room Pool hall in Sheffield. The five-times world champion reveals his backing for the Labour leader in the video. Other celebrities who have endorsed Labour in recent days include Harry Potter star Jason Isaacs, Gavin and Stacey actor Matt Horne, comic Paul O'Grady, actress Michelle Collins and broadcaster June Sarpong

title: Ed Miliband plays pool with Ronnie O'Sullivan - video
